channel.title: FroyoScape is in need of an Animator!
channel.description:
Some may cool us over crowded of staff, others call us a very unique server, and others say my ideas are the worst. But in order to make out creativity reality, we need someone that could animate our custom models (made by amy_webb), and that someone could be [b]YOU[/b]. Here's how you can apply:
[ol][li]Start by filling in [iurl=#application]the application[/iurl].[/li] [li]After that, you will be in pending, so if I do not reply right away, that means you are pending.[/li] [li]If you are accepted, then welcome to out skype group chat! In there, you will meet staff members Sibor, Flame_, ox random xi, and clawz fury. And of course me. Feel free to ask us ANYTHING.[/li][/ol]
[size=18pt]While you are pending...[/size]
[ul][li]you may be PMed by me or amy (as we control the modelling part of FroyoScape).[/li] [li]you will be pending for about 1 - 3 days.[/li][/ul]
[size=18pt]If you would like to contact the modeller, Amy...[/size]
[ul][li]ask me on skype if you'd like to talk to her. It's her personal way so I don't think I will mention this in public.[/li][/ul]
[anchor=application]Here's the application! [code=application] Name: Age: How long have you been with RSPS: Previous work: Skype: [/code]
You [b]MUST[/b] have a skype. This is the team's main way to communicate.

item.title: FroyoScape is in need of an Animator!
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:21, topic:481477”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=599713.msg4220258#msg4220258 date=1360696726]
I didnt even think of doing it like that, i would stil say using jagex’s animations for what arham is trying to animate is a bad idea.
[/quote] this isn’t for event guy, this is for reuni[/quote]Event guy is actually the one that can be edited, I was talking about reuni. But I feel like I’m commenting too much so I’ll stop

Read full topic

item.title: FroyoScape is in need of an Animator!
item.dc:creator: @poopler40 poopler40
item.description:
@poopler40 wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:18, topic:481477”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=599713.msg4219045#msg4219045 date=1360614852]

[quote author=the elve age link=topic=599713.msg4218894#msg4218894 date=1360608378]

[quote author=poopler40 link=topic=599713.msg4218768#msg4218768 date=1360592207]

Creating animation wasn’t the point of the topic, i believe it was to find someone who is able to animate models with current animations. As modelling a model (and doing a good job of it) takes anywhere from half an hour up, i don’t think an hour or more of animation is a hard price to pay.

Still looking for people who may be interested, we’d also like to see work you have done if you would like to apply. No pressure.
[/quote]Like when I said my earlier post, I meant, RSPoser is never used. You won’t find an animator.

you can just use jagex animations
[/quote]Not for custom NPCs (non human). I don’t know the exact terms but the models have to have the same “frame” and the frame part is what’s animated. So hear me out.

let’s say in Runescape, the model “Giant Spider”, you won’t be able to use that spider’s animation for any other spider in Runescape, because that animation is specific for that model.

Human models (like the 317 character) are a different story, clearly you’ll be able to transition those animations over because they have similar “frames”

I think the term was TSKIN or something wasn’t it?
[/quote]Haha, I believe so. Thanks[/quote]

You can use jagex animations for custom npc. Say you make a custom wolf npc. your wolf and a jagex wolf would have the same basic shape and structure, so if you animate your wolf with the same Tskin, Vskin, and PRI as a jagex wolf and use the correct animation id your wolf will be animated. This will work for any npc too.

Read full topic
item.source: FroyoScape is in need of an Animator!

item.title: FroyoScape is in need of an Animator!

[quote author=poopler40 link=topic=599713.msg4218768#msg4218768 date=1360592207]

Creating animation wasn’t the point of the topic, i believe it was to find someone who is able to animate models with current animations. As modelling a model (and doing a good job of it) takes anywhere from half an hour up, i don’t think an hour or more of animation is a hard price to pay.

Still looking for people who may be interested, we’d also like to see work you have done if you would like to apply. No pressure.
[/quote]Like when I said my earlier post, I meant, RSPoser is never used. You won’t find an animator.

you can just use jagex animations
[/quote]Not for custom NPCs (non human). I don’t know the exact terms but the models have to have the same “frame” and the frame part is what’s animated. So hear me out.

let’s say in Runescape, the model “Giant Spider”, you won’t be able to use that spider’s animation for any other spider in Runescape, because that animation is specific for that model.

Human models (like the 317 character) are a different story, clearly you’ll be able to transition those animations over because they have similar “frames”

I think the term was TSKIN or something wasn’t it? :P[/quote]Haha, I believe so. Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: FroyoScape is in need of an Animator!
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Some may cool us over crowded of staff, others call us a very unique server, and others say my ideas are the worst. But in order to make out creativity reality, we need someone that could animate our custom models (made by amy_webb), and that someone could be YOU. Here’s how you can apply:

[ol][li]Start by filling in [iurl=#application]the application[/iurl].[/li]
[li]After that, you will be in pending, so if I do not reply right away, that means you are pending.[/li]
[li]If you are accepted, then welcome to out skype group chat! In there, you will meet staff members Sibor, Flame_, ox random xi, and clawz fury. And of course me. Feel free to ask us ANYTHING.[/li][/ol]

[size=18pt]While you are pending…[/size]

[ul][li]you may be PMed by me or amy (as we control the modelling part of FroyoScape).[/li]
[li]you will be pending for about 1 - 3 days.[/li][/ul]

[size=18pt]If you would like to contact the modeller, Amy…[/size]

[ul][li]ask me on skype if you’d like to talk to her. It’s her personal way so I don’t think I will mention this in public.[/li][/ul]

[anchor=application]Here’s the application!

Name:
Age:
How long have you been with RSPS:
Previous work:
Skype:

You MUST have a skype. This is the team’s main way to communicate.

Read full topic
item.source: FroyoScape is in need of an Animator!
